titleStmt.title: A preamble with the protestation made by the whole House of Commons the 3. of May, 1641 and assented vnto by the Lords of the Vpper House the 4. of May.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Identified as both Wing E2682C and as Wing P3199.
